website_summaries.verdict: An entry-level smoker and grill combo that works best as a low-temperature smoker. Experienced smokers will figure out how to season the interior and rig up foil baffles to ensure a good seal, but others may become frustrated.
pros: Good entry-level combo grill and smoker with a decently sized cooking surface in the main chamber and a bonus cooking surface in the side firebox chamber
The steel fire grate’s height is adjustable, and ash removal is easy
cons: Experienced users warn that the interior and cooking grate must be seasoned before use
Standard model seems smaller than expected, and many report difficult assembly
A few say it feels flimsy
Paint may peel at high temps

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size, not too big but large enough for a family of four. Metal is lighter gauge than an Oklahoma Joe but solid enough. customer_reviews.title: Eh. Bubbling paint on outside and bad welding

All the nuts, holes and bolts fit without modification (a plus). My only remark is the powder coating should have endured. I know powder coating (having applied it myself for 20+ years), it should have handled the heat. However issues do arise, could have been the suffice, powder or curing. customer_reviews.title: Awesome results!!!  Good value for the money.

The barrell of the grill is taken up almost entirely by the bird and this causes uneven heating even with frequent rotation. Turkey was still good though. Im going to try a smaller turkey later... I bet it will do fine. The firebox takes smaller wood than i would like but uses wood slowly and smokes great. So if you are smoking turkey sized meats frequently get a larger grill. For ribs, boston butts, pork loin, shoulder, etc this smoker is perfect.

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Offset Smoker, 30"
product_meta.description: The Char-Broil 30" offset smoker can be used as both an offset smoker or a charcoal grill. Boasts 477 square" cooking surface, sufficient space for about 16 burgers. Black, powder-coated steel construction. Features lid-mounted temperature Gauge to easily Monitor internal temperature, & porcelain-coated cooking grates for easy cleanup. Firebox features a clean-out door to easily remove ash. New, three-piece smoking chamber construction helps prevent air loss & maintain smoking temperature. Side shelf & bottom shelf offer sufficient storage & prep space, & two 8" wheels for improved mobility.

Porcelain-coated cooking grates and lid-mounted temperature gauge
